CustomField.description: When checked then apex trigger will upsert a Chatter Bot Group record any time a private CollaborationGroup (Chatter Group) is created or updated. When unchecked, an administrator must manually create a Chatter Bot Group record to begin monitoring.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked then apex trigger will upsert a Chatter Bot Group record any time a private CollaborationGroup (Chatter Group) is created or updated. When unchecked, an administrator must manually create a Chatter Bot Group record to begin monitoring.
CustomField.label: Auto Create Private Chatter Groups?
